file_content.text: May as well learn something while you're stuck here.
Sergeant. Good to see Havoc Squad colors in the field!
Nasty fight out here. Can't tell friend from enemy half the time. Seps just take off their uniforms and blend into the villages.
Still, Fort Garnik's one of the better posts. Good for the training, you know?
They have quality instructors at the fort?
Got a combat instructor academy here so the best of the best come from all over the planet.
How long have you been in the field, Sergeant?
Just about three years now. Don't think I'd be here if it wasn't for the instructors at the FG.
Afraid I'm on duty. Have to be on my way.
Head up and see Lieutenant Forris when you get a chance. He'll show you how to survive in this craziness.
